description: The file is a React component defining the main page of a personal notes application. It manages state for notes, handles CRUD operations, and composes other components like Sidebar and NoteEditor.

methods.name: uuid
methods.description: Utility function for generating a pseudo-random ID string.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component for the notes application's page; manages notes state, selection, editing, searching, and renders child components.
